description.value:
For the duration, you know if there is an:

  • aberration,
  • celestial,
  • elemental,
  • fey,
  • fiend, or
  • undead

within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. Similarly, you know if there is a place or object within 30 feet of you that has been magically consecrated or desecrated.

The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

v.21.12.27

FoundryVTT: This is not automated beyond a VFX.
